table_of_contents.title: Androgens, androgen suppression, and prostate cancer: recent preclinical and clinical findings and implications / Jeanny B. Aragon-Ching, Nima Sharifi, and James L. Gulley

Behavioural effects of testosterone in men: directions for future research / Daryl B. O'Connor
The neuroendocrinology of testosterone: sociosexual behavior relations / George T. Taylor, Joshua Dearborn, and Susan Fortenbury.
